price: Darin sind wahrlich Zeichen. Wir haben (sie damit) fürwahr geprüft.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
